name: Trials of the Arcane
description:
A 2D roguelike platformer - a wizard's dark magic is bringing chaos to the world.

How to play

Make your way to the wizard's tower and defeat him.

WASD or arrows keys to move, W or Space jumps.  E to Interact

Credits

Game design: worgenwow, nev9n
Programming: worgenwow, nev9n
Level design: nev9n 
Art: callena
Music: nev9n

Using some pre-made assets:

  • Chaos spawn adapted from 'smudge' sprite by pneu
  • NPCs & Player adapted from Animated Pixel Adventurer by rvros
  • Background Music  Dark Mage Theme by Matthew Pablo
This game was made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
